1.content:
Lee slept and dreamt. The mundane parts of his life drifted away and the mysteries of the past coalesced before him. He stood in a city street. There were thoughts going through his head. It was the same dream again. He'd been having it all night. At the end he'd wake up squint blearily at the clock then doze off and the whole thing would repeat.

He was outside and his thoughts seemed to come fom elsewhere. THey were telling him things, about himself and the nature of reality. All the secrets of creation were being explained to him if he could just remember!

Before him, the air seemed to smolder and melt, asthough the world was a photograph and a giant hand held a flame behind it. Black holes formed, framed in running black plastic.

"You, do this. With your mind. It isn't difficult if you only REMEMBER"

He couldn't see what was beyond the holes. His thoughts, from wherever they came raced, endless knowledge. Another reality behind this one and portals leading through. Another world linked to this one... All real. All true. Remember!

It faded and he awoke.
1.title: Holes in the world

11.content:
Lee closed his eyes and began to drift again, seeking the dream. He could still here the voice in his mind and see the holes in the air. Now he was in a new dream place. Sitting on a chair facing a woman seated at a desk in a musty dark book lined study.

She licked her lips with an obscenely long tongue. "Think of me as a guide," she said. She wore black and had flowing black hair.

"You can change the world if you can remember how. I can help you." She smiled. "Find me when you wake and I will focus your power for you...."

Lee

12.content:
Lee walked as if in a daze. It was pitch black... still night, but he knew his home well. He let instinct guide his actions, not wanting to fully wake and break the spell. He was pulling on clothes. Yesterday's clothes, but it didn't matter.

Down the stairs, a familiar feeling of alien dread, a feeling he knew, persisted as he sliipped clumsily into his boots. Not lacing them.... no time...

He stood in his living room, at the site of an old dream. There had been a doorway in the wall, behind the sofa. He climbed onto the cushions and reached out. He knew. Not belief, but knowledge, which was different. The boundry between worlds was an illusion and all he had to do...

He was strangely calm as he reached his hand through the solid wall. It was here. Reality melted as in the dream, forming a dark portal. He moved forwards...
12.title: It begins

121.content:
Lee stepped through into daylight! This was incredible. His mind reeled and then cleared. The trance state he'd been in faded and he was awake in a strange new place! He was outside, on a pleasant summer's day. Birds were singing and there were trees around.

There was something not right about the trees. Hell, this whole thing was incredible!

Just visable through the woods was what seemed to be a town or city. There were structures and he could hear the bustle of activity. The air smelled sweet and pure and he heard running water nearby.
121.title: Stranger in a....

1211.content:
Incredible! Lee walked down the rocky path in a state of wonder. The air was thick and humid, full of scents or a nature gorgeous but unfamiliar! There was a lack of undergrowth but the trees... were strange; unlike anything he's ever heard of, let alone seen. Great trunks were green not brown and many had bristles. Leaves were immense like something of some unknown jungle. Overhead vast leaves the size of car parks cast shadow over the path. Some trees had massive trunks bigger than any building but off-white and topped by fungus like caps, others had think trunks topped by towering green blades which swayed in some impossible wind high above.
The terrain was mountainous and huge peaks rose all around. The familiar sounds of insects and birds were replaced by alien sounds unlike anything he'd heard before. The road to the city was relatively straight and he could see it but not yet clearly. Sometimes he was startled as huge creatures the size of rhinos flew overhead with helicopter noise of huge buzzing wings.

This was nowhere on Earth, unless it was the prehistoric era of dinosaurs and giant insects. But there were no cities then. Was this another world? Another reality, even?

Something was approaching. It made a thunderous noise on the road. Lee's eyes widened as he saw a vast black armoured shape approach. He moved to the side of the road and gasped as a beetle bigger than a horse charged past towing an old fashioned carriage!
1211.title: Strange Eden

choices: Lee tries to go back home

1212.content:
It's dark. And green. Lee walked through a strange alien wonderland with huge boulders and mounds and hills surrounded by vast towering shapes blocking out the sun and huge alien trees. Ahead was a huge hill. All around creatures run about. Alien creatures! Scared but curious went to investigate. They were man-sized just about but impossibly strange. They ran on all fours with long slender legs... but six legs! They were like huge insects. Their heads were smooth with strange dark eyes and their black bodies segmented each part reflecting the light in strange ways.

Where was he?

"Hello?" he called out to one of the creatures. It (she?) was terrifying to begin with but now seemed graceful and beautiful as she moved lithely across what looked like vast moss.

"Hello!" she called and the words appeared in his mind. Telepathy! "Who are you and where do you from? I am Issa." She had mandibles and antenna protruding from her head. She looked like a very strange horse.

Lee thought back trying to introduce himself and it worked.

"In answer to your questions you are in The World. We are the sisters of dream and you are invited to The City of Dream."

Ulla motioned behind her and he saw again the hill, now recognising it to be man- or ant- made, a vast mound over a hundred feet high crafted with bizarre architecture and designs and swarming with these strange beings.

"Won't you come?"

Lee was confused and more than a little afraid. But he was enchanted by Ulla's strange beauty and that of her sisters and city and was aching to see more! How could he risk losing this?

But then can she be trusted?
1212.title: Ulla

choices: Carry on to Dream
Enlightenment house
Something dangerous is coming
12122.content:
Lee was so enchanted by Ulla and her people that it took him a while to realise how alone he was. On a strange world surrounded by aliens and who knew if he could even get home? He felt a more than a little trepidacious about that but he couldn't not go! As he approached Dream they passed outbuildings and crowds of Ulla's incredible people. The architecture was unlike anything he had ever seen. Rather than simply building and then decorating it they seemed to treat the structure as a work of art. It was functional and beautiful at once but even so many surfaces were carved or painted with images and stylised writing.

Ulla explained "To build is divine! It helps them us understand the mastery of the Architect of All who made the world. We work with the geometry of language and and every structure corrasponds to the thoughts and dreams of the Sisters of Dream. We build as we live. We record our thoughts and hopes and dreams. This is all our poetry, our art. It is us."
Ulla moved her foreparts up briefly moving her front legs and Lee felt a surge of happiness. He was lost for a moment, simply feeling joy and then he realised that it was the telepathy; he was feeling Ulla's feelings!

Lee was lost for words. "It's..... "

Ulla smiled, "I'm so sorry; you must be tired and thirsty walking all this way with only two legs. Should we stop for refreshment? There's an enlightenment house near?

122.content:
....................





.........................EYES!

Huge blue eyes stared at him through the portal, and Lee felt his blood turn to ice! They receded and he saw her face again, but writ large. Pale white skin like a beautiful death, elegantly curved nose and lips in a cruel sneer. Long ebon hair fell across the view... NO! Her tongue, now bigger than he was flicked out, long and deadly and then a cold hard fist punched through into his world!

Fingers unclenched and grasped! He was caught in her cold palm. His heart pounded and the cold metal of her ring pushed into his neck as she stole him into this new world..

There was no air left in him to scream any more.

HER.

1221.content:
The giant girl was none other than his friend Bliss, although she was not normally this size. Indeed, in this world she was hundreds of meters in height. Lee noticed that his friend was wearing a thin bikini, and that she was every bit as beautiful in her giant form as in her regular-sized form!

He said, "Hello, Bliss!"

She replied, "How do you know my name? I am indeed called Bliss."

He said, "I came from another world, with a copy of you, and in my native world you were as tiny as I am. In that world you are one of my best friends, but in this world I have know way of knowing our relationship."

The giantess version of Bliss replied, "We can be friends, then. What is your name?"

He replied, "My name is Lee."

Bliss replied, "You are still not tiny, by the way, everyone else in this world is your size. Well, some are still giants compared to you, but all are tiny next to me."

He mused, "It's hard to think that you're just an ordinary woman in my home world!"

She replied, "In this world I was once an ordinary woman, but there was an enchantment which gave me this superhuman size and everlasting youth. Practically by default, I am now its sole ruler."

What is she about to do?

It was dark. The floor was smooth and there was no breeze. Where was he? He noticed with a start that the portal had gone! He was trapped!

"Hello?" he called, and was greeted by the shuffling of a crowd of people hidden in the darkness.

A female voice cries out, "Oh no, they got another one!" Lee felt a hand on his shoulder.

"What the hell is going on? Where am I?" he asked, the reality of the situation sinking in.

"My name is Kara. I'm so sorry... you've been captured just like we all have. This box is some kind of trap. We all walked into it and couldn't get out. There IS no way out..."

He could here sobbing. His blood was running cold.

"Who? WHO captured us?"

Kara's voice choked, "A woman.... a gigantic woman. I don't know if she's big or she somehow shrunk us all but to her we're the size of

He walked through the passage and - He couldn't believe his eyes as he was again in his living room. the place he entered the portal.

Still in disbelieve he went to the kitchen and into the shower. Everything was the same although there was something strange but he couldn't tell what it was.

He went back into the living room and sat down on the sofa. It felt different then usual, though. As he reached for the remote control he realised that the buttons where fake. The TV was fake and so where the lights and switches. Where was he?

This question struck him as he walked around in his fakehouse until he took a look out of the window.

1242.content:
Lee stared out of the window in a state of shock. It certainly wasn't the world he knew. It seemed gloomy, but not dark; a yellowish light. The ground stretched away forever and the sky was..... just wrong. Pale and whitish with a sun too painful to look at. The landscape was utterly flat.... and blue! There was some strange vegetation of blue fibres half as tall as him like a vast blue cornfield. And terrible shapes loomed. A dark mountain,which didn't look right.

THOOM!

What was that? An earth tremor? So loud? He felt it in his bones. Deep, booming, terrifying.

"Hide!" a voice hissed.

What?

It was terrified, urgent. From somewhere nearby and hidden.

"Please for the love of god hide!"

THOOM!

He looked at the top part of the window, and what he'd thought to be a blind or curtain. No.... It was off-white and.... smelled! Stale, like cheese! It was of course ropelike fibre and as he looked up it seemed draped over the whole house.... What?

"Please..." the mystery women begged, " Hide! She's coming. Pleasee please hide. She'll get you!"
1242.title: The house of not quite right

125.content:
Lee tripped and caught himself on the back of the setee and then shook his head, bewildered. What on Earth had he been doing? "I must have been half asleep," he thought, staring around as if waking up. "Was I trying to climb over the furniture and walk through a wall?" Weird. He glanced around and found the clock. Three a.m.! He could've done without this. Really. It was summer and he wanted to be up at a reasonable time to make the most of it.

Shaking his head, Lee turned away.

As the sun rose early that morning, everything was peaceful until something from an alternate world where real fat and humongous cartoon characters live got through into Lee's world from beyond by going through a portal between Lee's world and the being's world as well.

In this case a real fat and humongous animated red cat from the Yokai Watch cartoon got through into Lee's world as his shadow was looming over everything around him as he was now in Lee's world.

"Now that I'm in this world having gone through that portal, what can I do to entertain myself at a time like this?" The real fat and humongous animated red cat lamented to himself.

Just then something caught his attention in this case a swimming pool in Lee's backyard that was already full of water.

"I know I'll go for a swim and relax while I'm at as well." He said.

Soon enough the real fat and humongous animated red cat heavily stomped towards Lee's backyard as he made his way towards the swimming pool and stepped right in as he sat down in the water and started relaxing.

"Now this is the life if you know what I mean." The real fat and humongous animated red cat said.

Eventually...

Rules? Well I don't like guy on guy porn, but other than that go where it takes you. ;) (This does not imply that this is porn. It can have porn bits or whole paths, but parts are proper sci-fi! The sci-fi bits can go that way too though. And vice versa. It's a mix.
